dataList.name: Measured Clashes
dataList.desc: On Clash Win, gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Suppressed Movements
dataList.desc: On Clash Win, inflict 2 [Binding] on the target next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: Strider [Mao]
dataList.desc: On Hit against enemy with [BurstAgility]: inflict +1 [Burst] Count on the target (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Vigor [Mao]
dataList.desc: When attacking targets with slower Speed than this unit's, inflict +1 more [Burst] or [Burst] Count

dataList.name: Dominator [Mao]
dataList.desc: If this unit's Speed is faster than the target's by 3 or more, Coin Power +1

dataList.name: The Book of Vengeance
dataList.desc:
When hit, inflict 1 [MiddleFingerBook] against the attacker (1 target per turn; max 1)
On Skill Use, if the target has [MiddleFingerBook], gain ([MiddleFingerBook] / 4) Clash Power (max 2)
- If the target has 8+ [MiddleFingerBook], gain ([MiddleFingerBook] / 3) Base Power (max 3)

dataList.name: Vengeance Tattoo
dataList.desc: Every time a Middle ally is killed in this encounter, gain 1 [AttackUp] (max 5)

dataList.name: Chains of Loyalty
dataList.desc: When an ally from the Middle is killed, gain 1 [PlusCoinValueUp] next turn. (max 2)

dataList.name: Corpse Cleanup
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if anyone died this turn, heal 5% HP
On Kill, heal 2~5% HP

dataList.name: For the Family
dataList.desc: Turn End: heal SP equal to the number of surviving Sweepers

dataList.name: Night in the Backstreets
dataList.desc: When joining after Wave 2, enter with 30 SP.

dataList.name: Seize ya Chance
dataList.desc: Cannot be Staggered while a usable Counter Skill is in this unit's Skill Slot.
